sentences: Greg Koch (born 1966) is an American guitarist from Wauwatosa, Wisconsin.
Koch grew up in the Milwaukee area and began playing guitar at the age of 12.
In April 2012 Fender Musical Instruments Corporation named Koch one of the top 10 unsung guitarists.
Koch and his wife have been married since 1993.
Koch won first place in the 1989 Bluesbreaker Guitar Showdown judged by singer/guitar player Buddy Guy.
Greg Koch is currently a Martin Guitar clinician.
The Koch Marshall Trio is an instrumental organ/guitar trio established by Koch in 2017.
Koch also has a signature guitar which was released in 2019 by Reverend Guitars, named the ‘Greg Koch Signature Gristlemaster’.
Since 2011, Koch has made monthly promotional videos for Wildwood Guitars in Colorado.
In 2019 Koch signed with True Grit Talent Agency.
Koch uses a guitar pick held with the index finger and thumb of his right hand to pick the bass notes; he uses his other three fingers to pick the treble strings.
